name: p7d-markdown-it-figure-with-p-caption
description: convert into the figure element with the figcaption element, for a paragraph with only images, or a table or a code block or a blockquote, and by writing a caption paragraph immediately before or after.

p7dMarkdownItFigureWithPCaption.disableS.description: Disable the default CSS of p7d-markdown-it-figure-with-p-caption.

p7dMarkdownItFigureWithPCaption.displayU.description: Display marks caption's unnumbered label. Ex. img, table, video, pre-code, pre-samp. By plugin's default, blockquote are enabled.
Display all caption's unnumbered label. Overrides option: displayUnnumberedLabelMarks.

p7dMarkdownItFigureWithPCaption.convertJ.description: Convert full-width space to half-width space in label joint.

p7dMarkdownItFigureWithPCaption.notSetIm.description: Not set width, height, lazyload attributes of image element.

p7dMarkdownItFigureWithPCaption.wrapIfra.description: Wrap iframe elemet without a caption by figure element.
Wrap iframe type blockquote elemet without a caption by figure element.

p7dMarkdownItFigureWithPCaption.setFigur.description: Specify default class name of figure element that Wrap iframe type blockquote.

p7dMarkdownItFigureWithPCaption.wrapVide.description: Wrap video elemet without a caption by figure element.

p7dMarkdownItFigureWithPCaption.useImgAl.description: Use the alt attribute of the img element for the caption. Specify the text of the label. Example: "Figure" , "図"

p7dMarkdownItFigureWithPCaption.useImgTi.description: Use the title attribute of the img element for the caption. Specify the text of the label. Example: "Figure" , "図"

p7dMarkdownItFigureWithPCaption.useImgAt.description: When creating a caption paragraph from image attributes using the setImgAttrToPCaption command, specify the caption label language when the attribute value does not have a label.: "ja"(default), "en"

p7dMarkdownItFigureWithPCaption.setRoleD.description: Set role="doc-example" to figure element that has > pre > :is(code|samp) element.
